content: Why does ICALP always put "cryptography" in CFP (track "A") without having a single cryptographer in the PC?
author: Anonymous

content: Not that it's so important nowadays anymore, but the pdf formating for the cfp and pc is very poor. The page gives me a chance to print the cfp and pc via printing the web page, but the format is poor; couldn't they create a nicely formatted pdf file?
author: Anonymous

content: There go my Valentines Day plans....
author: Anonymous

content:
To Anonymous #3: why don't you submit on February 13? That would be a perfect Valentine gift for your sweetheart and you.

In fact, I suspect that a deadline after Valentine's day would mean that people would be thinking about their papers (possibly scribbling on napkins) during supposedly romantic dinners :-)
author: Luca Aceto
